description.de: Erhellt Bereiche mit schlechten Lichtbedingungen in einer grünen Monochrom-Anzeige bis zu 1000 Meter weit.
description.en: Illuminates low light levels up to 1000 meters in a green monochrome display.
description.es: Ilumina las zonas de poca luz hasta 1000 metros con luz verde monocromada.
description.fr: Illumine des faibles niveaux de lumière et jusqu'à 1000 mètres sur un fond monochrome vert.
description.it: Illumina gli oggetti scarsamente illuminati fino a 1000 metri con una luce verde monocromatica.
description.tr: Illuminates low light levels up to 1000 meters in a green monochrome display.

description.tr: Illuminates low light levels up to 1000 meters in a green monochrome display.

description.de: Erhellt Bereiche mit schlechten Lichtbedingungen in einer grünen Monochrom-Anzeige bis zu 1000 Meter weit.
description.en: Illuminates low light levels up to 1000 meters in a green monochrome display.
description.es: Ilumina las zonas de poca luz hasta 1000 metros con luz verde monocromada.
description.fr: Illumine des faibles niveaux de lumière et jusqu'à 1000 mètres sur un fond monochrome vert.
description.it: Illumina gli oggetti scarsamente illuminati fino a 1000 metri con una luce verde monocromatica.
description.tr: Illuminates low light levels up to 1000 meters in a green monochrome display.

description.de: Erhöht die gesamte Gesundheit des Fahrzeugs um 16 % und reduziert die Angriffe mit C4 um 30 %.
description.en: Increases the vehicle's total health pool by 16%, and C-4 damage is reduced by 30%.
description.es: Aumenta la salud total del vehículo un 16% y reduce el daño recibido de C-4 en un 30%.
description.fr: Augmente la capacité totale de santé du véhicule de 16%, et les dégâts infligés par le C-4 sont réduits de 30%.
description.it: Aumenta la barra della salute totale del veicolo del 16% e gli attacchi da C-4 sono ridotti del 30%.
description.tr: Reduces damage from attacks to the front, side, and top by an additional 6%.  Rear attacks are reduced by an additional 15%.  C-4 attacks are reduced by an additional 30%.

description.de: Erhöht die gesamte Gesundheit des Fahrzeugs um 18 % und reduziert die Angriffe mit C4 um 35 %.
description.en: Increases the vehicle's total health pool by 18%, and C-4 damage is reduced by 35%.

description.fr: Augmente la capacité totale de santé du véhicule de 218%, et les dégâts infligés par le C-4 sont réduits de 35%.
description.it: Aumenta la barra della salute totale del veicolo del 18% e gli attacchi da C-4 sono ridotti del 35%.
description.tr: Reduces damage from attacks to the front, side, and top by an additional 9%.  Rear attacks are reduced by an additional 20%.  C-4 attacks are reduced by an additional 45%.

description.de: Erhöht die gesamte Gesundheit des Fahrzeugs um 20 % und reduziert die Angriffe mit C4 um 40 %.

description.fr: Augmente la capacité totale de santé du véhicule de 20%, et les dégâts infligés par le C-4 sont réduits de 40%.
description.it: Aumenta la barra della salute totale del veicolo del 20% e gli attacchi da C-4 sono ridotti del 40%.
description.tr: Reduces damage from attacks to the front, side, and top by an additional 12%.  Rear attacks are reduced by an additional 25%.  C-4 attacks are reduced by an additional 60%.
